trans-unit.source: Specifies which encryption methods can be used.
trans-unit.target: 指定可以使用的加密方法。

trans-unit.source: You use the MachineKeyCompatibilityMode values when you set the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置时使用的 MachineKeyCompatibilityMode 值<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the encryption methods that were implemented in .NET Framework versions earlier than version 2.0 Service Pack 2.
trans-unit.target: 使用加密方法实现在.NET Framework 版本早于 2.0 版 Service Pack 2。

trans-unit.source: Initialization vectors (IVs) are used for all encryption operations except for storing encrypted passwords in the ASP.NET membership database.
trans-unit.target: 初始化向量 (Iv) 适用于除 ASP.NET 成员资格数据库中存储加密的密码的所有加密操作。

trans-unit.source: Use the stronger encryption methods that are available in .NET Framework version 2.0 SP2 and later versions.
trans-unit.target: 使用.NET Framework 2.0 SP2 和更高版本中可用的更强的加密方法。

trans-unit.source: Initialization vectors (IVs) are used for all encryption operations.
trans-unit.target: 初始化向量 (Iv) 用于所有加密操作。

trans-unit.source: Use encryption methods that are available in .NET Framework version 4.5 and later versions.
trans-unit.target: 使用.NET Framework 版本 4.5 和更高版本中可用的加密方法。

trans-unit.source: Compared to the encryption methods that are used for Framework20SP1 and Framework20SP2, the ciphertext that is generated by the default cryptographic routines is slightly smaller and is more resilient against certain classes of theoretical attacks.
trans-unit.target: 与用于 Framework20SP1 和 Framework20SP2 的加密方法相比，生成的默认加密例程已加密文本略小并更灵活处理针对特定类别的理论上的攻击。

trans-unit.source: They also integrate with [!INCLUDE[win8](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] directory key management in order to get required cryptographic keys.
trans-unit.target: 他们还与集成[!INCLUDE[win8](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]目录以获取所需的加密密钥的密钥管理。

trans-unit.source: This option also enables you to specify custom cryptographic routines by writing a class that derives from <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector"></xref> and specifying the class name in the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DataProtectorType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 此选项还可以通过编写派生自的类来指定自定义加密例程<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector"></xref>并指定中的类名称<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DataProtectorType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following configuration requirements apply to this option: 1.
trans-unit.target: 以下的配置要求适用于此选项︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DataProtectorType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property has a value, the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ApplicationName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must also have a value.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DataProtectorType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性具有值， <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ApplicationName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性还必须具有一个值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> attribute must specify a system-defined validation algorithm (such as MD5, SHA1, HMACSHA256, HMACSHA384, or HMACSHA512) or a custom validation algorithm in a class that derives from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>特性必须派生自的类中指定的系统定义的验证算法 （如 MD5、 SHA1、 HMACSHA256、 HMACSHA384 或 HMACSHA512） 或自定义的验证算法<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The values AES and 3DES are not validation algorithms.
trans-unit.target: AES 和 3DES 的值不是验证算法。

trans-unit.source: When you specify this option, forms authentication tickets are always both encrypted and signed, regardless of the value specified for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration.Protection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 当指定此选项时，窗体身份验证票证进行始终同时加密和签名，而不考虑为指定的值<xref:System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration.Protection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。

trans-unit.source: View state is also both encrypted and signed if a page's property is true or the property is .
trans-unit.target: 视图状态还都加密和签名如果页面的<> *1> 属性是 true 或<> *1> 属性是.
